description: black ink on paper; image of bearded man wearing long robe in middle center; leans on cane with PL hand; basket and fishing rod in unseen PR hand; large flat woven umbrella carried on back; shading and foliage along upper right and middle left edges; blades of grass in lower left quadrant; untranslated characters in black ink along lower right edge; red stamp in LRC
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych
title: Sage [center of a triptych of Dragon, Sage, and Carp]
